t: Amazon.com: Hasbro Gaming Simon Hand Held : Toys & Games
s: Simon is back again in a miniature 4-inch form--small enough to fit in a pocket but still featuring buttons large enough to play with friends. Press the circle in the middle and try this classic memory test as it adds one by one to a series of tones and colors.

t: Amazon.com: Hasbro Gaming Simon Swipe Game : Toys & Games
s: The Simon Swipe game has the iconic colors, lights, and sounds of the classic Simon game in which you respond to the ever-increasing pattern of the light and sound combinations, but now touch screen technology adds an extra challenge to the game.
